Originally published in 1935, The Luck of the Bodkins follows the tangled romantic strands snarling up young Drones Club member Monty Bodkin's life.

Monty loves Gertrude. Gertrude thinks he loves Lotus Blossom. Lotus Blossom loves Ambrose. Ambrose thinks she loves his brother, Reggie. Reggie loves Mabel...

And that's just the beginning!

Mistaken identities, broken engagements, luxury ocean liners crossing the Atlantic, smuggled jewels -- and a Mickey Mouse toy with a screw-top head - - all add to the mayhem and merriment.
